GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|popula.description: Path to geojson file storing polygons of populations.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|popula.label: Polygons of populations

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|res.description: Desired resolution for tree cover map, will be obtained via resampling. To be specified in decimal degrees (0.01 ~ 1 km). Minimal value 0.001 (~100m).
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|res.label: Resolution of tree cover map

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|YOI.description: List of years for which tree cover should be extracted (maximum range 2000 - 2023).
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|YOI.label: Years of interest

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|TCY.description: Tif file of year-by-year tree cover, cropped to bbox extent
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|TCY.label: Tree cover year-by-year

GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|time.p.description: List of years for which tree cover information is available.
GFS_IndicatorsTool>get_TCY.yml@23|time.p.label: Years with tree cover information

metadata.name: Get GFW forest cover change 2000-2023
metadata.description: Component of the Genes from Space tool. Given an area of interest, creates a raster stack describing forest habitat presence year-by-year from 2000 to 2023.
